short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Non-Desk chrome extension provides news on remote employment, WFH, and staff management for various sectors and industries.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Non-Desk is a chrome extension that brings you the latest news and information on non-desk and remote management.

For various sectors such as call centers, cleaning, construction, delivery, education, electricians, events, field services, fitness, food and beverage, handyman, healthcare, home care, hospitality, HVAC, lawn care, logistics, manufacturing, pest control, plumbers, real estate, retail, security, staffing, transportation and more.

We understand the importance of staying up to date with the latest trends and techniques in managing non-desk employees, which is why we strive to provide you with the most relevant and reliable information on the topic.
Our goal is to make it easy for you to stay informed and manage your non-desk employees effectively.
